entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
